kp1:1.1: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
kp1:2.1: I take refuge in the Buddha,
kp1:2.2: I take refuge in the Teaching,
kp1:2.3: I take refuge in the Sangha.
kp1:3.1: For the second time I take refuge in the Buddha,
kp1:3.2: for the second time I take refuge in the Teaching,
kp1:3.3: for the second time I take refuge in the Sangha.
kp1:4.1: For the third time I take refuge in the Buddha,
kp1:4.2: for the third time I take refuge in the Teaching,
kp1:4.3: for the third time I take refuge in the Sangha.
